thread.title: #FeesMustFall: ‘ANC must stop being arrogant’

author: news24.com
title: #FeesMustFall: ‘ANC must stop being arrogant’
text:
ANC secretary-general Gwede Mantashe ate humble pie when protesting students forced him to climb off a truck to receive their memorandum of demands in the Johannesburg city centre.
Thousands of students, who took part in a march to deliver the memorandum at the ANC’s Luthuli House headquarters in the city centre, demanded that Mantashe climb off the party’s campaign truck to receive it.
He initially resisted but the students, from the universities of Johannesburg and Wits, wouldn’t budge and he was forced to climb off the truck.
Extraordinary scenes played themselves out in Sauer Street as students also attempted to force Mantashe to sit down, but he refused and threatened to leave.
